Comment: Abilities: A07P (Fiery Aura), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Increases the movement speed and life regeneration rate of nearby friendly units. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 4% movement, 1 HP regeneration bonus. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 8% movement, 2 HP regeneration bonus. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 12% movement, 3 HP regeneration bonus. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 16% movement, 4 HP regeneration bonus.
